content.detailedDescription: Hi, i'm abraham from philippines. i'm just wondering if any one from your team can investigate this picture that i took about 3 weeks ago. me and my friend just past by in this rice field near a volcano not to far away from our home, just now i realized there is something out there in the sky that is really weird. when i started browsing my photos from a holiday back in my homeland philippines. i took this picture using my iphone 4s so it's not really a high resolution, but attached is the raw file of this photo. just send me your email address. thank you.
content.summary: It is a grayish metal, that is flying above the rice field near a volcano called mt. mayon

content.detailedDescription: Noticed a large flock of terns behaving erratically. to the south noticed a slowly moving object near them. two silver balls joined together. it continued moving slowly to the north east for about 10 minutes, then it was out of sight range.
content.summary: Noticed a large flock of terns behaving erratically.

content.detailedDescription:
I live in the millcreek area of salt lake and have a fabulous view. we sit outside all the time .
starting on august 17th myself and multiple witnesses have seen, photographed and videotaped two bright objects ( larger than stars ) > the larger of the two appears , hovers for 10-15 minutes at a time .  it then pulsates, becomes brighter , dimmer......   a smaller object is sometimes seen. it flies directly into the larger object, then flies away. it circles the object and changes directions many times .    the larger object will then move to the north , disappears, reappears  several times.
sometimes it also appears that the large r object emits a light toward the ground .
the object is in the western sky to the south of the great salt lake. 
i see planes fly above and below it.
it is below the cloud cover
i have posted this on fb and several people have seen the same thing. one person for two years.It she also spotted a large black aircraft fly over her house .
i have contacted the media-nothing. faa-nothing 
i have spoken with an astronomer . he said it is not a star, or satellite or conventional aircraft.
this object is out there every night 

my photos were taken on a tripod . bulb mode auto iso f 10
i have a nightvison video on the first generation sony camcorder but i have to get it off my recorder.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Recurrent huge lights in the evening sky

content.detailedDescription: On 8/30/2013 at 5:10 am my small house dog started barking to be let out of her kennel. i got up to let her out. i went out through the garage where our other dog sleeps. when the dogs went outside one of the dogs just stopped an stared in a ne direction as if she seen something. i looked in the direction she was looking and noticed a row of lights in the sky. i first thought my vision was blurred due to just waking up, but then i noticed the lights were randomly flashing. the formation of the lights looked like this ----v----. i went to get my binoculars to see if i could get a better look and when i came back the lights were in 4 orbs in a diamond formation. i didn't feel threaten because it was several miles away. i tried to take a picture with my camera phone but it was just a blur due to the distance. it faded away and was gone.
content.summary: Dog barking to go outside. let out and dog stared in direction. looked up and saw a row of light in sky very close together.

content.detailedDescription:
On august 27th 8.05pm ist me and my wife were in our terrace. we saw a star like ufo glowing. and it was on a clear sky day. fist we thought its a star. but we can identify the object is not very far only a mile distance because we can see the other stars in the sky. 
the object fist glowing like a star and after 20-30 sec its shape changed to a golf ball with yellow color. and again it glowing like a star and then after its shape changed to golf ball with yellow color. this happened four times and suddenly disappeared.

noted other incidents:
i have been watching sky over 4 months april - aug 2013. 4-5 times i have seen ball shaped object moving over the sky with no sound in yellow color. these objects were like a fire ball and slowly moving without any sound.

i can recognize this because planes and helicopter are usually moving around the sky making sound and i can see the shape also.

so now a days every day i am watching sky... 
i don't have a camcorder to record this, i already book one and will be getting it soon.
content.summary: Star like ufo

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Blessings in yehoshua !
i live @ present in phoenix, az in an apt. complex.
i was getting the mail, routine task....@ evening on ~ approx. august 24th, 2013...This year....~ 9:00 - 9:30 p.M.
i was heading back to apt. when i looked up...As i often do..To the night sky. there above, coming from the north were several star-like silent objects moving quickly...They darted in and out of formation....Which stars do not do....With one lower....A milky-white color...It had a strange " tadpole-like " shadow shape moving clock-wise underneath ! they all continued to the east...And went higher and higher up, vanishing into space....'til no longer visible. i felt elated-excited like, and almost breathtakingly affected....
i had felt like i had finally witnessed something out-of-the-ordinary, what so many claim to have experienced-seen....Witnessed. i personnaly felt...To me...That in some way the objects were " conscious " of me....Which is why i felt an almost child-like happy-bright-breathless feeling......Somewhat euphoric ?1
content.summary: Several bright constellation like objects sped away, one closer milky white with strange dark moving shadow shape underneath,  quickly to the east....

content.detailedDescription: I was wathing tv when i.Saw a light  darting.Around in.The sky..I knew it couldnt be.A plane. so i ran outside and got the neighbors. i watched it for about half a hour.As it hovered notio.Less ove ou eastern sacramento. it movef about 3 more tomes  but wss.Motionless.Before  slowly drifting behind the trees. i called the police and.The news but they both vere very dismissive. i went inside about 9 & didnt sleep much.
content.summary: A thick flying saucer that changed colors.

content.detailedDescription: Going to work around 530 am about a mile from my  house in feburary 2013 at first i thought it was a planet because of its brightness then i noticed it moving i kept driving about 1/2 mile and then the object was directly over me i shut my truck off thinking i would here something but i heard nothing whatsoever. i sat there a minute nothing happened and i went on to work. that eveing i come home to tell my mom about it and before i could even walk inside she came outside and started telling me how something flashed in her window and woke her up about 5:50 around 20 min after i left. she said she looked out the window, ( i have a 9 acre field beside my house) and that something really bright was lifting up from the field. well the following night i had someone shine a light in my moms window and snatched on my back door. this was on a thursday then on that saturday the same thing happened. well ever since then we have had this same person do a lot of creepy and messed up things and i cannot seem to catch him. have made 3 police reports too,(nothing ever come of that) well at the time all the stuff starting happening with the person trying to get in i didn't think nothing more about what i seen in the sky, until about two months ago when i seen it again i watched for about 25 min straight it never moved none at all it was completely staitionary. after watching it for a while i called my girlfriend and told her to come outside that i was going to pick her up. so i drive about 50 yards from where i had been sitting watching it at to my back porch, i pick her up then 45 seconds after i just seen it it i pull back for her to look at and its gone. ever since then i have seen it 14 more times in the past two months. # other people has seen it with me a few times. today is 8/29/13 and i have seen it the past two nights. whatever this is is watching us. the past two nights we have seen it it will be in one spot the whole time. but both nights i have pulled out of the driveway made a u turn and pulled right back in and it will disappear. and where my house is at you cant see nothing at all from the rock road i live down, so only us at the house could see it. there is much more stuff i could write but i need someone that knows hthey are doing to plese help us. i don't know if the person trying to get inside has anything to do with the light but that is a heck of a coinsidense that the following night from the first morning we seen it that someone tried to get in. there has been so many things that has happened. all of this really isn't made up at all so if someone could help me. text the number i have listed or something please. thank you
content.summary: It appeared to be a star the first time i seen it  didnt move any for 30 min then dissapeared

content.detailedDescription:
On the 27th of august 2013 we saw a strange orange light floating in the sky that moved ever so smooth. it was a viberant orange that floated faster than a balloon but slower then a plane or a helicopter. this night waws 845 pm 4 witnesses.
to night knowing this has been seen over several night through out pa we were waiting and watching with no luck. i got up to go inside and there it was i called next door witnesses out of their homes to witness. we watched the same orb for almost 5 min and it changed direction and zigzagged. we will be watching over the next couple nights.
content.summary: This was the second night in a week and found other cases through out pa it is on video. from me

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work at 9:30pm. as i drove up wyman st heading north i observed lights that appeared to be too low to be a plane. as i approached the intersection i observed the lights were just above the trees and seemed to be floating in a sort of mist or fog that was just arround the lights. there was no sound coming from it. when i was about 30 ft away the light faded out very quickly and it was gone. i was talking to a colleague from work at the time on my phone. i was really freaked out and had to pull over because my heart was racing and i couldn't stop shaking.
content.summary: Observed lights hovering above trees at intersection. as i drove closer, lights faded out and disappeard aprox 20-30ft.Above me.

content.detailedDescription: I was getting into my passenger door when i looked up and saw the fireballs. i had seen the same thing on the 4th of july 2012. a firework that never goes out. i felt it was a ufo, 3 orangish orbs in a silent v formation. very high above in an empty cloudless evening. the sun was setting but they brightly stood out. the first wave came in from the south west, continued north, then slightly veared north west. all three waves followed this path as if following each other.First wave 3 in a v, 3 in a straight line, then 2 that came in like straglers lagging behind. i couldn't believe i was seeing this again. i wasn't scared or worried, more surprised. i took photos. they all seem to be projecting lights off the bottom, appearing an orangish color, one appears blueish in the photo and upon zooming in appears much like saucer shape with a blue outline around it.I lost site when they continued farther north west.
content.summary: Were leaving for dinner noticed 3 fireball-ish orbs in a v formation. they passed then 3 in a straight row, than 2 straglers behind them.

content.detailedDescription: It look like a star wars ship but it was not it had something
content.summary: It had something on it

content.detailedDescription: We look up and there it is
content.summary: My wife and i looked up and watched a v shaped craft orbiting  the same plot of air space then shift rapidly the lasted a hour and half we have new american aiforce base

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: It was at about 500ft at an unknown distance (maybe 50-100 miles, we are unsure). another friend texted saying they could see it from alton, hampshire which is 100 miles away and a 2 and a half hour drive. it was flashing red green and white very quickly. a plane flew past during the sighting but the object was still in the same place and never moved, definetly not a plane or helicopter.
content.summary: Red, green and white flashing lights.

content.detailedDescription:
The first sighting was in july 2012, when i witness light orbs, too many to count. most of them were white, one or two were red, and they blinked on and off. over a period of approximately 2 hours, they slowly came closer to the cabin i was staying in with a friend. eventually, they were approximately 30 feet from the cabin. one orb glided to the cabin and around the side, not more than 10 feet from us.

then, august 6, 2013 and during a lightening storm, i witnessed large glowing lights in the sky, directly in front of the same cabin. first there were two lights, then three. they stayed in the same general area but changed positions, forming a straight line, then a triangle. then the 3 lights became 4 lights. it's hard to judge distance, but i would say perhaps a 1/4 to a 1/2 mile. this lasted more than an hour and a half. i went into another room for only a few seconds. when i returned they were gone. as soon as the lights were gone, one light orb, similar to what i saw last year, came from my right and soared along the tree line in front of me, went up and down in the trees, then soared off to my left. it was not more than 30 to 40 feet from me.
content.summary: Light orbs, too many to count, as well as 4 lights hovering in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was headed home from my brothers apartment. i decided to take back roads, because i thought it be would be a little faster than main roads, less cops. on my way i hit a traffic light that wouldn't turn green for me. after 3 light cycles i turned right and then a u-turn and another right to continue straight. i was blaring my music because i had recently upgraded.

about 5 minutes after the traffic light, i was on kissel road. i couldn't remember if there was a stop sign at hunt-club and kissel. when i approached the intersection i slowed expecting a stop sign. after i didn't see one i started accelerating again and then a light appeared above. **very bright light that seemed to hover for a split second. it was already dark with little cloud coverage. the light appeared, like it spawned, then took off heading west with a slight curve in its trajectory (south). it was out of sight just as fast as it appeared.

i have friends that have seen ufo's but i have never seen one until now. right when i saw it i thought, "that's it." i finally have seen one. i was flustered and got a little teary eyed. not sure why but i know i didn't say anything. it went off into the sky and foliage surrounded my car once again. but i started to second guess myself, trying to pin other things, but nothing  moves that fast.

i felt like it was almost destiny for me to have seen it. there was a little window in the tree coverage to have seen it, and i did. the street light and me taking the back roads would have all changed my location.
content.summary: Driving, headed west. light appears above, very bright. continues west at an incredible speed until light dims to black.

content.detailedDescription: On the night of july 25th my buddy and i were stargazing in a field in fairport ny when we saw what looked to be a bright star at first. it gave off this fiery look to it and it moved fast across the horizon. it got bigger and brighter and would hover in certain places at a time and then move swiftly across the horizon without any engine noise. eventually the ufo passed over us and when it did the bright fiery light went out and it had red and white lights blinking (possibly disguising itself as an airplane). the only way we could tell it wasn't from this earth is by the lack of noise the engines were making and the immense light that it produced on the horizon. the craft also flew pretty low for an aircraft so i'm pretty sure we should've been able to hear something. it was quite an experience seeing this and it confirmed my belief that we are not alone in this universe.
content.summary: A fireball craft hovering in certain spots moving across the horizon then passing over me.

content.detailedDescription: I am a sky watcher and somewhat familiar with most objects in our skies. this object first started appearing in the north about 6 months ago or more. when it appears{after dark}usually around 7-8pm cst. it shows up first as a bright white orb. then proceeds to start cycling thru different colors. i thought this was a strange star for a very long time because it reliably remains in the same place sometimes night after night. august 29th 2013 for the first time i observed it move location and also appear to release a smaller orb then reabsorb it. it did not move far just went behind some trees. i went out and checked the new location and it was still same object doing the same light show. it makes no sounds but it very noticeable in the sky. i lost sight only because i had to go to sleep. it was still in the sky when i went to sleep around 11:00pm. since it shows up a lot my next sighting i will try a video camera with a zoom lens and document this. when i get that i will send this along, so it can be analyzed. thanks for your help with this. i really would like to know what this could be, man made?, a weird star that moves?, planet, or a genuine ufo (unknown).
content.summary: A reliable appearing glowing orb - changes from red, blue, green, yellow, white

content.detailedDescription:
While we were star gazing during the latest meteor shower, we started noticing lights that look like stars but would suddenly flash randomly and then go black. the lights would then take off in different directions. we've been seeing these mostly in the northern sky between the big dipper and the  cassiopea constellations between 9.30 pm and 10.00 pm central standard time. 

one night last week when we saw this, the dogs (about 30 neighborhood dogs) all around us were barking loudly and continuously until the lights left. 

last night, when we were walking, we observed the lights again. the light flashed bright then went black - about four times. then the light disappeared all together. we've also witnessed two lights doing this at the same time then chasing each other across the sky.

we know they are not planes. but we can't tell how close or far the objects are. 

we don't have the equipment necessary to film this observance. hopefully one of you can.
content.summary: Flashing lights over last couple of weeks between the big dipper and cassiopea constellations in northern sky.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I went outside to smoke a cigarette at about 12:30 last night. after i lit up, i start to stargaze like i usually do. something odd caught my eye. an object, that i first thought maybe was a star, was moving around in odd directions and had three different lights on it. it looked like it was a few miles away. i figured it was a triangle because it had one on each "end". it would dart left and right, up and down, and did kind of a corkscrew at one point. a very feint trail was left after it moved. eventually a second object moved in, and this one was much less bright, but still had some light coming off of it. possibly the other one was damaged? they danced around with each other for about five minutes then stabilized. both would occasionally move in the same direction. after about 10 minutes the movement slowed down and they both seemed to just be hovering. 

at that point i went inside and fell asleep. 

weird night.
content.summary: Two triangular ufos

content.detailedDescription: I was laying by the pool when i noticed my sun was being blocked.I looked up and first i thought it was a eclipse  then i took took picture for proof of what i was seeing.I later analyzed the photos and noticed lights in side the the circle as if to be looking under this object.I want sure what i was seeing i also noticed red lights.I feel that what i was seeing was solid and worth looking more into.
content.summary: I was laying by the pool..A shadow converts the sun so i looked up and here's what i saw

content.detailedDescription: My father my sister and i were having a fire outside from around 10pm to 12:30am so it was pretty dark my sister had just felt sick and went inside she said she had a head ache and felt like she was going to pass out but she was fine after (we don't know if this had anything to do with the ufo) and litterly 10 seconds after she went in i was observing the stars above my house and all the sudden a really bright light appeared i thought it was a satellite or the iss and then it started zipping across the sky it was very bright white round and it came with a faint whirring sound and another identical circle joined and they were zipping in zig zag formations across the sky this lasted for at least a minute it was impossible to be a air plane or helicopter it was too fast and was flying in dimensions they can fly in. i tryed to get my fathers attention and every time he looked they stopped but then we both saw the circles zip across the sky and disappear we were both astonished.
content.summary: Very bright zig zagging across night sky 12 - 12:30am

content.detailedDescription: Just step outside for a smoke and looked north toward st johns mi(i am 5 miles south)and seen a very bright light shooting across the sky (heading north east) leaving a trail like a shooting star but it lasted till it went behind the trees (6 sec or so). it lite up the sky where it was and left a very long trail. right after that the dogs in the neighborhood started barking. it looked like a comet to me.
content.summary: Look like a comet to me.

content.detailedDescription: I walked out my back door to pee and noticed a brighter than usual plane coming toward me so i kept watching and then i noticed it looked like 2 planes one on top of the other, as it got closer i realized this was not a common airplane profile. most planes have about 4 lights this object had at least 12. also i think it was about 2 times taller than a commercial airliner. it was moving over 200 miles an hour. then i thoght this must be a blimp so the next day i got on the enternet and found out most blimps top speed is 40 mph.
content.summary: Thought it was a plane till it got closer then noticed it was a taller profile

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside around 9 pm taking care of dog duties.  i looked up in the western sky and was noticing the big dipper and arcturus when movement in the sky just left of arcturus caught my attention.  it was a small, dim, white, semi-transparent, trapezoid shaped object that moved quickly across the sky from the west to the southeast in about 5 seconds.  the object faded off into the distance as i lost sight of it.

the shape of the object was a trapezoid.  the long sides were oriented vertical, with the longest side being the leading edge of the object.  the leading edge appeared brighter than the rest of the object.  the object was dimly lit, about as bright as an average star.  the color was mottled white, whereby  the surface of the object appeared to faintly sparkle or twinkle (similar to the twinkling of stars)randomly across the object, giving it a mottled or semi-transparent appearance.  

it had no other colors or fixed exterior lights and made no sound (as aircraft would). 

it was about 60 degrees above the horizon.

whatever it was, it was way out there and moved fast.  it took about 5 seconds to go from a west to southeast direction.  it made a straight line path and maintained the same elevation across the sky.  

it left/had no trail.  there were no aircraft in the sky at that time.  it was a clear night.
content.summary: Small dim white/semi-transparent trapezoid shaped object moved quickly across sky from west to southeast then faded off into distance

content.detailedDescription:
I was going home to lewes from my job in maryland, driving at 55 miles per hour.

thought i saw a bright stationary light, until it started moving rapidly over the treetops.

weather cloudy...No storms or rain, etc.

very bright blue round light, approximately what appeared to be 10' or larger going over treetops and buildings, intermittently going on and off every 
3 or 4 seconds, going from east to west.

battery light indicator came on, then my entire dashboard lit up with all the various prompts showing problems....Abs brakes, convertible top indicator showing top was down (which it wasn't), air bag indicator light, traction control light, etc.

lost sight as i continued driving east.

had to replace battery next morning and was told alternator corrupted.
content.summary: Driving east on rt. 9 several miles from lewes, de, saw what i thought was stationary very bright blue light, until it started moving west over the treetops and buildings intermittantly every 3 or 4 seconds going on and off.

content.detailedDescription:
I was going home to lewes from my job in maryland, driving at 55 miles per hour.

thought i saw a bright stationary light, until it started moving rapidly over the treetops.

weather cloudy...No storms or rain, etc.

very bright blue round light, approximately what appeared to be 10' or larger going over treetops and buildings, intermittently going on and off every 
3 or 4 seconds, going from east to west.

battery light indicator came on, then my entire dashboard lit up with all the various prompts showing problems....Abs brakes, convertible top indicator showing top was down (which it wasn't), air bag indicator light, traction control light, etc.

lost sight as i continued driving east.

had to replace battery next morning and was told alternator corrupted.
content.summary: Driving east on rt. 9 several miles from lewes, de, saw what i thought was stationary very bright blue light, until it started moving west over the treetops and buildings intermittantly every 3 or 4 seconds going on and off.

content.detailedDescription: At the time i had stayed with my fianc��� at her aunt's house for a few months.  i had spent many nights on the back porch looking into the sky.  i have witnessed a possible 12 or so sightings of things i could not explain.  there was never any noise during any sightings.  i do not know which direction i observed these objects(n,s,e,w) but can say it was looking towards the mountains over towers with the blinking white lights. i always seen the lights on the towers so i know it wasn't them. i will return with pictures of where i have stood, give direction and details of what was around me. most sightings were around midnight to 2 in the morning.  the more i started seeing, the more i would go out around those times. it started to become interesting and i probably did this a few times a week for a few months.  i know that fort indian town gap is about 15 miles away to my right when looking at mountains.  these objects where mostly in front of me looking towards mountains.  these objects moved fast, in weird patterns and sometimes in groups or coming toward each other. they were always solid white. sometimes streaks would follow.  i assumed they may be falling stars but falling stars don't do what these lights did.  most times i would ignore it thinking i just may be nothing.  but the day i went out back on porch i happened to look up facing towards mountains and seen these objects. i had never seen objects during the day.  there was no noise, movement or other objects in the sky.  just these four dots in the shape of a square.  my heart felt like it was racing.  i had time to get my phone and take a pic.  i probably watched them for about 30 seconds before taking pic.  after i took pic, i checked to see if i got them.  when i looked up, they were gone. to be honest, i hardly remember taking pic and forgot about it until i was going thru pics.  to me it seems strange i would forget such a thing.  it took me a few days at looking at pic to get some recollection of how i ended up with this pic. i am a believer and am not a good liar. now i have proof of something i have never seen before. it is what it is.
content.summary: Went on back porch and looked up.  did not move so had time to take a picture.

content.detailedDescription:
1.Watering the garden. 2.It caught my eye. 3. it was a ufo due to its maneuvering across the sky.

4.  the bright white circle (orb)of light (no haze or distortion)appeared in the se sky
at incredible speed moved to another location in the sky. color changes took place, then at great speed moved to another position paused for a few seconds, shot off to another location, paused (1 second).Then shot off to another position in the sky (to change colors). moved again (possibly in 30 degree angle to its original path).It then paused for a few more seconds in the sky, moved very fast to another position, pausing for a few seconds,again at 30 degrees approx. it then shot across the sky, nw direction
and disappeared in a split second. i have flying experience, i was in gulf war 1. this was not a helicopter or an aircraft. its movements and speed were not of this world.
5. i'm watching a ufo again. the zig zag actions of its flight path made me move about looking up (with a stiff neck). i felt it was trying to be noticed.
6. it shot off across the sky in a nw direction so to be out of sight. 

i will be informing our local ufo group(12 in number), at the next meeting in september.
keep up the good work guys, i am on your mailing list.

best regards
alan
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Larger than stars,a bright disc of changing coloured light, stationary then flying to another position to remain stationary. pausing a few seconds.

content.detailedDescription: For the past month i been observing for the past month a star like (bright object) that at first i was not sure if it was a ufo or a star. i live in a condo and usually go out briefly for some air, the first time i saw this light it was hovering in the sky (above 500 ft) by the miami airport (i have a good sense of direction and i could tell it was by the miami intl airport)at a high altitude. i thought it was a plane descending in the distance but after 10 minutes the light remain there, the sky was clear and it was about 8:30pm at aprox 8:50pm i noticed that the light had changed direction so i knew it was not a star.  this event has then repeated for the past month, i am going to say since early august of 2013, and now the light has been in a sw position in what it seems the same direction. the event is always the same, a bright object in the distance (at first it looks like a plane, since we have heavy traffic in the miami metropolitan area) but it isn't. last night 8/29 at about 9:00pm i saw something that i have never witness,,,,i saw the light again or object, i went back in to my apartment again and came out. i kept looking at this object and it looked as if the light disappear for a few seconds, then the light reappeared again only to disappear a few moments later. the best example i could describe is as if you were watching a bright object at a distance and in an instance you see it disappear before your eyes, like if something was sipping it. this event made me realize and gave provided me evidence that what i been watching for the past weeks is not a star. i will try taking a picture of it this time.
content.summary: Bright light (star like) object hovering for the past month, and then disappears*
